articles.author: Tim Vickery
articles.title: Morocco loss no disaster for Brazil team in holding pattern - ESPN India
articles.description: Brazil may have slumped to their second-ever defeat to an African side but, for a team without a permanent coach, there were positives to be taken.
articles.content: Brazil suffered their first ever defeat by an African side when they lost to Cameroon in the group stage of the 2022 World Cup. Just over three months later they went down 2-1 to Morocco in Tangiers … [+5073 chars]
